RestrictionsLifted.RestrictionDescription: All schools open, with outdoor after-school sports and activities allowed.
Two people can meet outdoors to socialise (Go for a coffee or picnic etc.).
Care home residents allowed one regular visitor, with whom they can hold hands.
Rule of 6 or two households outdoors, including private gardens. No household mixing indoors.
Outdoor sport and leisure facilities open (tennis & basketball courts and golf courses).
Organised outdoor sport allowed (children and adults).
Stay at home rule scrapped, but stay local.
Outdoor parent & child groups (up to 15 parents).
Weddings of up to 6 people.

ShortDescription: Gyms, Hairdressers, Retail & Pub Gardens Reopen

RestrictionsLifted.RestrictionDescription: All shops reopen.
Restaurants and pub gardens open for outdoor use (including alcohol).
Gyms & spas can reopen for individuals and households.
Hairdressers, beauty salons and other 'close contact services' reopen.
UK domestic holidays away from home permitted, with self-contained accommodation able to reopen for use by members of the same household.
Children allowed to attend indoor play activities, with up to 15 parents or guardians allowed to join them.
Zoos, theme parks and drive-in cinemas can reopen.
Libraries and community centres can reopen.
Weddings attended by up to 15 people can take place.

Description: International Travel (Subject to review), indoor entertainment & 30 person outdoor limit.
ShortDescription: International Travel, Cinemas & Indoor Hospitality Reopen

RestrictionsLifted.RestrictionDescription: People can meet in groups of up to 30 outdoors.
Six people or two households can meet indoors.
Pubs, restaurants and other hospitality venues can seat customers indoors.
Up to 30 people can meet to celebrate weddings or other life events, like christenings.
Remaining outdoor entertainment, such as outdoor theatres and cinemas can open.
Indoor entertainment such as museums, theatres, cinemas and children's play areas can open.
Remaining accommodation.

Some large events (except for pilots) capacity limits apply.
Indoor events : 1,000 or half capacity.
Outdoor other events 4,000 or half capacity.
Outdoor seated events: 10,000 or quarter capacity.
Hotels, hostels and B&Bs can reopen.
International leisure travel will resume no earlier than 17 May.
Adult indoor group sports and exercise classes can start up again.

Description: Nightclubs, larger events & no legal limit on social contact.
ShortDescription: Nightclubs Open & No Limit On Social Contact

RestrictionsLifted.RestrictionDescription: All legal limits on social contact will be removed
No legal limits on the number of people who can attend weddings, funerals and other life events.
Nightclubs will be allowed to reopen.
